entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Petawawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:52 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 6:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.2°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain mixed with snow near midnight then to flurries overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
